thread.title: Mr Gareth Edwards
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Mr Gareth Edwards

author: Mr Gareth Edwards
title: Mr Gareth Edwards
text:
First rate product and service . I made an error in my address details which I only realised after completing the order. It was resolved quickly and easily even on a Sunday evening. Product arrived a day or two later . Well within projected time scale. Would certainly use again.
Gareth
